name: Dark Time(Early Prototype)
description:
Episodic bullet hell game, it will consist of 5 episodes (there will be a "Records" mode on the jam for now).  The main character controls time. In gameplay, the main character can slow down time.. The hero will shoot blasters and cold weapons. According to the plot, the main character is an employee of a corporation that destroys time paradoxes. There will be a different time in each chapter. There will also be a "Records" mode. There you need to defeat enemies and survive as long as possible. 

Three locations. Four types of enemies. One hero. "Records" Mode - it's survival mode where you need to hold out as much as possible.

We'll tell you about the story mode later...

(This game is made for game jam.)

It's still an early alpha test. The game is not completely ready. There will be updates, improvements and so on.

Controls:

  1.  Movement - WASD 
  2. Left Click Mouse - Shoot
  3. F - Stopping Time
